import React, { Component } from "react"; import * as tenderService from "../../services/tenderService"; class CustomerTenderDetails extends Component { state = {}; displayTenderItems = () => { let srNo = 0; return this.props.tender.itemList.map((item) => { srNo++; return ( {`#Q000${srNo}`} {item.category} {item.name} {item.quantity} {item.unitOfMeasure} ); }); }; handleCancelTender = async () => { await tenderService.cancelTender(this.props.tender._id); }; renderTenderDetails = () => { const { tender } = this.props; return (

Tender

/ Tender Detail
Tender Ref No

{tender._id}

Closing Date

{tender.closingDate}

Delivery Location

{tender.deliveryLocation}

Tender Products List

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

{this.displayTenderItems()}
Sr. No Category Item / Description Qty Unit of Meassure

Suppliers List For Tender

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

Ref No Supplier Code Supplier Name Amount Supplier Rating Action
#S0001 #T686868 Mo Danish 20000.00 USD 10 Rating View Detail
#S0002 #T686823 Al Habib Reheman 20000.00 USD 09 Rating View Detail
#S0003 #T686821 Mo Imran 20000.00 USD 07 Rating View Detail
#S0004 #T686843 Jakir Khan 20000.00 USD 05 Rating View Detail
); }; render() { { this.props.tender === null ? this.propshistory.push("/customer") : this.renderTenderDetails(); } return; } } export default CustomerTenderDetails;
